member.name: D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS
member.summary: Specifies whether text snapping is suppressed or clipping to the layout rectangle is enabled. This enumeration allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS.D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS_NO_SNAP
member.summary: Text is not vertically snapped to pixel boundaries. This setting is recommended for text that is being animated.

member.name: D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS.D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS_CLIP
member.summary: Text is clipped to the layout rectangle.

member.name: D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS.D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS_ENABLE_COLOR_FONT
member.summary: In Windows 8.1 and later, text is rendered using color versions of glyphs, if defined by the font.

member.name: D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS.D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS_DISABLE_COLOR_BITMAP_SNAPPING
member.summary: Bitmap origins of color glyph bitmaps are not snapped.

member.name: D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS.D2D1_DRAW_TEXT_OPTIONS_NONE
member.summary: Text is vertically snapped to pixel boundaries and is not clipped to the layout rectangle.
